Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13 (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

On iOS 10 Some Features (Control Center and Switcher) at the moment don’t work, I’ve planned to fully support it as soon as possible.

Glow SpringBoard Elements with Glowy!

The Tweak Gives the Opportunity to Select Custom Glow Shadow Reflections Colors for the SpringBoard Icons, Control Center Modules/StatusBar, Dock, Badges and the Switcher Headers! (More to Come).

Configure options from Settings.
